type.name: org.gradle.plugins.ide.eclipse.GenerateEclipseWtpFacet
type.description:
* Generates the org.eclipse.wst.common.project.facet.core settings file for Eclipse WTP. * If you want to fine tune the eclipse configuration *

* At this moment nearly all configuration is done via {@link EclipseWtpFacet}.

method.name: getFacet
method.description: * The Eclipse WTP facet model containing the details required to generate the settings file.

property.name: facet
property.description: * The Eclipse WTP facet model containing the details required to generate the settings file.
